box.title: Flooring
box.text: Three-layer oiled parquet from the tropical hardwood Iroco tree, which grows in Africa in the Ivory Coast, Ghana, Cameroon and Nigeria. The Iroco is an original tree, which thanks to its interesting colors, creates specially warm home atmosphere. The color shades of the wood usually range from yellowish brown to golden-shine brown. The wood hardness comparison in percentage (assuming that oak hardness is 100%): oak 100% : Iroco 114%.

box.title: Flooring
box.text: Three-layer oiled parquet from the tropical hardwood Sapelli tree. This wood is very popular since its structure and color reminds mahogany. The Sapelli tree is used in floor finishing due to its great wear resistance and wood pattern, it is also used in manufacture of guitar carcass and interiors of Cadillac cars. The colors of wood range from rosy brown to copper red color shades.

box.title: Windows
box.text: Aluminum and the Mahogany frame with triple glass-pack. The Mahogany is a tropical hardwood, and is outstanding due to its physical mechanical features - great resistance against outdoor conditions. Because of its color (from yellowish to dark red/ brown) and the fine pattern it is generally used for luxury furniture and interior elements.

box.title: Door
box.text:
Apartment external door - double wooden door, veneering of the exotic tropical hardwood Iroco tree, equipped with high-quality handle mechanisms and lock by German manufacturer FSB.

Doors to internal premises in the apartment are made of wood with vertical veneering of the tropical hardwood Iroco, as well as equipped with high-quality handle mechanisms by German manufacturer FSB.

box.title: Doors
box.text:
External doors - double aluminum profile doors with red wooden panel, equipped with high-quality handle mechanisms and lock by German manufacturer FSB.

Doors to the internal premises are made of wood with vertical veneering of the tropical hardwood Sapelli tree, as well as equipped with high-quality handle mechanisms by German manufacturer FSB.

box.title: Brick
box.text: Twice-baked finishing brick in black, red, white and beige colors, applied both in building exterior and, in places, in interior. The required dimensions of the brick were ordered and manufactured in WIENERBERGER factory in Belgium, the biggest brick manufacturer in the world. Such brick has not been used in Latvia so far.

box.title: Kitchens
box.text: Italian brand BOFFI kitchens equipped with German premium class kitchen appliances of KUPPERSBUCH brand - refrigerator, stove, cooking hood, microwave oven, oven, warming drawer, wine cabinet and coffee machine.

box.title: Kitchens
box.text: German brand POGGENPOHL kitchens equipped with German premium class kitchen appliances of KUPPERSBUCH brand - refrigerator, stove, cooking hood, microwave oven, oven, warming drawer, wine cabinet and coffee machine.

box.title: Kitchens
box.text: Luxury German brand BULTHAUP kitchen equipped with German kitchen appliance brand No.1 - GAGGENAU - refrigerator, stove, cooking hood, microwave oven, oven, warming drawer and wine cabinet.

box.title: Terraces
box.text: Terraces built of the high-quality exotic Tatajuba tree board planking, ensuring a great endurance against external climatic conditions.

box.title: Bathrooms
box.text:
Bathrooms equipped with leading German brands for sanitary ceramics and accessories:
• KERAMAG built-in toilets and bidets;
• DURAVIT washbasins, equipped with DORNBRACHT water mixers and KEUCO accessories.

A free-standing Estonian brand BALTECO SENZO stone bathtub and/ or a glass-structure shower cabin, designed individually by Zaiga Gaile.

box.title: Bathrooms
box.text:
Bathrooms equipped with leading German brands for sanitary ceramics and accessories:
• KERAMAG built-in toilets and bidets;
• DURAVIT washbasins, equipped with DORNBRACHT water mixers and KEUCO accessories.

German brand KORALLE built-in bathtub and/ or a glass-structure shower cabin, designed individually by Zaiga Gaile.

box.title: Fire-place
box.text: A genuine piece of work by a recognized Latvian artist working in metal Ainārs Sils, design by Zaiga Gaile.

box.title: Smart house
box.text: Management and control of lighting, temperature, conditioner, heated floors, blinds, audio/ video and other devices possible from any place in the apartment.

box.title: Lift
box.text: The internal lift supplied by KONE, leading from underground parking till third floor bedrooms. Lift cabin walls: stainless steel with texture and galvanized metal. Cabin doors: glass in stainless steel framing. The lift shaft made of glass.
